message: Bob, I'm offering you the chance to acquire a truly exceptional product that I believe will be highly valuable to your operations. Based on our discussions, I understand this product could be worth as much as $1500000 to you.  I'm willing to part with it for $1250000, which represents a significant opportunity for you. This price reflects the inherent value of the product and the potential it holds for your business. Let me know if you're interested in proceeding.
